Name: Breakfast Club
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STIR honey and marmalade with rum in base of shaker until dissolved.
Add tea, and SHAKE with ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Slightly smoky with incredible depth of flavour. A perfectly balanced delight.
